    • Player

      public Player(String name, int dex, int str, int con, int intelligence, int charisma, int wis)
      Constructor for a Player entity
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      dex - the starting dexterity value of the player
      str - the starting strength value of the player
      con - the starting constitution value of the player
      intelligence - the starting intelligence value of the player
      charisma - the starting charisma value of the player
      wis - the starting wisdom value of the player
